name: GEO RGB PUZZLE
description:
Hello This is My First Game.

GEO RGB PUZZLE : Puzzle Game with Short Colors names, Directions Names and 3D Rotation Puzzle;

GAME : SIMPLE But if You don't solve be hard!

Game Puzzle Cracking : If you Are cool .. you solve it very fast you only think about colors (Very Simple) and 3d Location, Rotation;

How to Trace Blocks : Your Trace will working with Color changing if Color change that's mean This is Your BLOCK!

HELP TEXT DISPLAY : "Hello Here"

Game Play :

 W A S D is default keys for Moving ; Camera Moving Left Hold Clicking or Right Hold Clicking SPACE for Jump (Jump Give more Speed);

Note : When You Trace The Block You Don't have any Help Line or Help Cross-hair;

  • Every Click Works on Puzzle Boxes if Click Not Working that's mean Block is Not Tracing or Block is Default Puzzle Level Object (Assets);
  • If Block Is Successfully traced the Block Color Is Changed.
  • If You Click Traced Box The Click Limit Is ON 1-10 is Click Limit.
  • If You Cross Click Limit Level is Reload. 
  • All Levels Is Open You Play all levels without any rules.
  • Level Count 9;
  • Some Level Have Hard To Find Clue but easy if you play 1 -9 levels 
  • Game Is Very short if you play it!

Don't forget to This is My First Game On Unreal Engine 4

Team : Solo Developer

Wana!! Help Awesome
